lessons.name: Definitions
lessons.description:
Set Q deals with common errors about definitions.It goes with the "Meaning and Definitions" chapter of Harry J.Gensler's Introduction to Logic (Routledge Press).
Assume that these definitions try to explain current usage and don't stipulate how a term will be used.

staticQuestions.question: Science is that cold and empty worship of experiments.
A tent is a movable dwelling made of canvas.
Philosophy is the study of the human condition.
Logic is that dreadful discipline that analyses reasoning.
An old person is anyone over seventy.
A game is an amusing competition between various players.
A logician is an obnoxious hair-splitter.
A fish is an animal that lives mainly in the water.
A male is whatever has male reproductive organs.
A police officer is a mere cop.
"Uncle" means "brother of a parent".
Knowledge is a true belief that is absolutely certain.
A bachelor is an unmarried man who weighs over 50 pounds.
Triangles are what you study in geometry.
Architecture is frozen music.
An apple is a red fruit.
A warm day is one that is over 86 degrees Fahrenheit.
Religion is a way of life based on belief in a supreme being.
A university instructor is just an egghead.
"True" means "proved to be true".
A chair is whatever is used as a chair.
A teacher is one who instructs children.
A net is anything with interstitial vacuities.
Cars are vehicles powered by gasoline.
Bread is the staff of life.
"God" means "object of ultimate concern".
A piano is any musical instrument with keys to select notes.
A pro football player is someone who works for a pro football team.
A man is a featherless biped.
Punishment is anything unpleasant done to a person.
A king is the ruler of a country.
Backpacking is the enduring of misery by living out of doors.
Knowledge is true belief.
A belief is the closing of a phase of an intellectual symphony.
A politician is a scoundrel involved in politics.
Philosophy is the attempt to transcend cognitive subjectivity.
A doctor is a man who is licensed to practice medicine.
"Human being" means "whatever is descended from human beings".
A computer is a box made by Dell that has a keyboard and a screen.
A lie is a falsehood that you assert to be true.
Philosophy is the discipline developed by Aristotle and Plato.
An adolescent is a person between 9 and 19 years-old.
An adult is anyone over 17.
Philosophy is what you study in philosophy classes.
A cold day is one that is under 20 degrees Fahrenheit.
An honest person is one who doesn't steal.
"Murder" means "killing of a human being."
A liberal is a permissive do-gooder who knows nothing.
Logic is that wonderful discipline that analyses reasoning.
"Chair" means "what you sit on."
A conservative is an inflexible person who never thinks.
A wrong action is one that is against the law.
A child is anyone between 2 and 12 years old.
A football game is whatever is played by the rules of football.
A kitten is a young female cat.
Logic is defined as that subject that is treated by LogiCola.
Knowledge is the cognizance of a reality by an intellect.
A bird is an animal that can fly.
"Metaphysics" means "any sleep-inducing subject".
"Tall person" means "person over 6 feet tall."
